 17 /**
 18  * Creates a new labeled hotspot instance.
 19  *
 20  * @class A hotspot with a label under it. The label element can be accessed using
 21  * the getLabel method and styled as any HTMLElement. See {@link bigshot.HotspotLayer} for 
 22  * examples.
 23  *
 24  * @see bigshot.HotspotLayer
 25  * @param {number} x x-coordinate of the top-left corner, given in full image pixels
 26  * @param {number} y y-coordinate of the top-left corner, given in full image pixels
 27  * @param {number} w width of the hotspot, given in full image pixels
 28  * @param {number} h height of the hotspot, given in full image pixels
 29  * @param {String} labelText text of the label
 30  * @augments bigshot.Hotspot
 31  */
 32 bigshot.LabeledHotspot = function (x, y, w, h, labelText) {
 33     bigshot.Hotspot.call (this, x, y, w, h);
 34     
 35     this.label = document.createElement ("div");
 36     this.label.style.position = "relative";
 37     this.label.style.display = "inline-block";
 38     
 39     this.getElement ().appendChild (this.label);
 40     this.label.innerHTML = labelText;
 41     this.labelSize = this.browser.getElementSize (this.label);
 42 }
 43 
 44 bigshot.LabeledHotspot.prototype = {
 45     /**
 46      * Returns the label element.
 47      *
 48      * @type HTMLDivElement
 49      */
 50     getLabel : function () {
 51         return this.label;
 52     },
 53     
 54     layout : function (x0, y0, zoomFactor) {
 55         this.layout._super.call (this, x0, y0, zoomFactor);
 56         var sw = this.w * zoomFactor;
 57         var sh = this.h * zoomFactor;
 58         this.label.style.top = (sh + 4) + "px";
 59         this.label.style.left = ((sw - this.labelSize.w) / 2) + "px";
 60     }
 61 };
 62 
 63 bigshot.Object.extend (bigshot.LabeledHotspot, bigshot.Hotspot);
 64
